# C3 Career Consultants - Best Consultancy in Patiala

## About
C3 Career Consultants is the best consultancy in Patiala, Punjab offering career guidance and competitive exam coaching since 2002.

## Services
- Career Counselling
- SSC Coaching
- UPSC Coaching
- Banking Exam Preparation
